api.noToken: There was no token included in this request.
api.invalidToken: The token that was provided is not valid or incorrect.
api.featureDisabled: This action could not be completed because the feature has been disabled by the System Administrator.
api.userCreated: The user %USERNAME% with the unique identifier of %UUID% is new, profile created.
api.userAlreadyExists: The requested user already exists in the database, the user creation is being terminated.
api.userDoesNotExist: The requested user does not exist.
api.noNotifications: You do not have any notifications, good day!
api.databaseError: A database error has occured trying to process this request. Please try again later.

error.noReportServers: The report feature could not be loaded because no public servers are avaliable. Consider asking your System Administrator to add one.

web.notLoggedInBefore: You have not logged in before. You are required to login before becoming a community site member. You can jump on and play here: %SITEADDRESS%/play
web.emailAlreadyInUse: The email you have provided is already in use, please enter another email and try again.
web.passwordDoesNotMatch: The password you have provided does not match. Please try again.
web.registrationError: There was an error in registration, please try again later.
web.registrationSuccess: You are now successfully registered. Please go back and login to get started!

applications.noApplicationsFound: No applications could be found at this time.

event.noEventsScheduled: There are currently no events scheduled, come back later.
event.eventCreated: The event %NAME% has been successfully created!

server.noServers: There are currently no Servers that can be displayed at this time.
server.serverCreated: The Server has been successfully created!
server.serverEdited: The Server record has been edited successfully.
server.serverDeleted: This Server has now been deleted.

session.newSessionCreated: A new session has been created for %UUID%
session.allSessionsClosed: All sessions for %UUID% have now been closed.
session.userFailedLogin: The username or password you have entered is incorrect, please try again.
session.userLogout: You have been successfully logged out.

announcement.noAnnouncements: There are currently no announcements set.

filter.phraseCaught: This message was blocked due to the usage of blocked words/phrases.
filter.linkCaught: This message was blocked due to the usage of blocked links/sites.
